name: Mind the Vikings
description: Allow me to welcome you to the land of the vikings. A land where you can build a village full of silly vikings, each with their own weird and quirky traits!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD FX-6300 with at least 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560/Radeon HD 6850 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: It's a work in progress, that means required minimum specs will change during development, when we add stuff, it will rise, as we work on performance, it will hopefully decrease.
